abstract: About 50 students showed up at an event where Representative Michele Bachmann was scheduled to speak Tuesday night. The police arrived soon after and cordoned off the group, and Mrs. Bachmann did not speak publicly.
snippet: About 50 students showed up at an event where Representative Michele Bachmann was scheduled to speak Tuesday night. The police arrived soon after and cordoned off the group, and Mrs. Bachmann did not speak publicly.

headline.main: Students' Arrival Appears to Disrupt Bachmann Event
